ComicInfo.Title: I Married A Zombie!; Chuckie and Harry; Midwestern Wedding; Delirious; Little Payday Saves the Universe from Total Destruction; Hit And Run High-Jinx!!!; The Origins of The Bunch; Hey, Mode... it says here they want people to come down to Nicaragua and help out..."; The Reject

ComicInfo.Summary:
The positive side of marrying a zombie.
Tootles has breakfast
Bed time for Chuckie and Harry
Mr. Inferno's individual taste
Cora feels alienated at a conservative wedding in Minnesota.
In Jersey City, both parents must find work to support their child.
Payday creates a fighting stick from a toilet bowl scrubber.
The guys go on a rampage in the car
How Aline adopted her alias The Bunch
Doggo decides to help the Nicaraguan rebels.
Tommy constructs a fallout shelter
The bullying of the school loner
